snippet: Mr. Bagley’s case caused a war within the national security complex over whether the defector he encouraged, Yuri Ivanovich Nosenko, was a Soviet agent sent to trick the Americans.
abstract: Tennent H Bagley, former CIA officer who helped Soviet spy Yuri Ivanovich Nosenko betray his country, and then tried for a half-century to prove that the defector was actually a Russian double agent, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bagley’s case caused a war within the national security complex over whether the defector he encouraged, Yuri Ivanovich Nosenko, was a Soviet agent sent to trick the Americans.

headline.main: Tennent H. Bagley, Who Aided, Then Mistrusted a Soviet Spy, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Tennent H. Bagley, 88, Who Aided, Then Mistrusted a Soviet Spy
